messages.message:
Hi Team, today i spoke with a company in Asia and they mentioned working with a lot of regulated clients that aren't fans of SaaS. I clarified the models we DO support.
They mentioned that in Japan many large FSI companies rely on Oracle Cloud as they are tied to legacy Oracle databases they struggle to migrate off of.
I know we don't support Oracle for VPC, just curious has this come up before as a requirement and has it been or will it potentially ever be an item for our roadmap?
thanks
Oracle cloud has been in place at large FSI as well in France like at BNPP. Unfortunately this is not something we support I guess. Curious to hear the feedback on this question.

we have looked into and done a POC on OCI for federal customers, but we haven't had enough interest to make it worth the investment to support. @Jason curious to get your thoughts on if OCI is something we want to investigate again depending on commercial demand like this
We came across the same with Tokyo Marine while working with Genpact
